scripts.build-electron-react: rm -r -f build-react && rm -r -f build && npm run copy-package && npm run rm-public && npm run rm-src && npm run copy-src && npm run copy-public && cross-env REACT_APP_ELECTRON='true' npm run build && npm run post-process-react && npm run rename-client-build && npm run copy-icon
scripts.build-electron-react-windows: (rd /s /q build-react || echo no build-react) && (rd /s /q build || echo no build-react) && npm run copy-package && (rd /s /q public || echo no build-react) && (rd /s /q src || echo no build-react) && npm run copy-src-windows && npm run copy-public-windows && cross-env REACT_APP_ELECTRON='true' npm run build && npm run post-process-react && npm run rename-client-build-windows && npm run copy-icon-windows
scripts.rename-client-build-windows: move build build-react || echo something happened
scripts.copy-icon: mkdir build && mv build-react/background.png build && mv build-react/icon.icns build && mv build-react/icon.ico build
scripts.copy-icon-windows: mkdir build && (robocopy /move build-react build background.png || echo something happened) && (robocopy build-react build icon.icns || echo something happened) && (robocopy build-react build icon.ico || echo something happened)
